legendary.name: Eldershard, Blade of the Eternal Stars
legendary.description: A longsword infused with the essence of the cosmos, said to cut through the very fabric of reality.

legendary.name: Frostfang, Sword of the Eternal Winter
legendary.description: This blade embodies the chill of winter, freezing foes in their tracks.

rare.name: Bloodsong, the Whispering Blade
rare.description: A blade that sings a haunting melody, instilling fear in the hearts of its enemies.

rare.name: Dawnbringer, Sword of the First Light
rare.description: Forged from the first light of dawn, this sword banishes darkness and evil.

common.name: Stormrend, Blade of Thunder
common.description: A sword that crackles with the energy of storms, bringing forth thunder with each strike.

common.name: Nightshade, the Shadowed Edge
common.description: A blade that blends into the shadows, it strikes without warning.

legendary.name: Sunsunder, Edge of the Celestial Flame
legendary.description: A katana forged from the heart of a dying star, wreathed in everlasting flames.

legendary.name: Voidseeker, Blade of the Abyss
legendary.description: This katana cuts through both flesh and spirit, seeking the void between worlds.

rare.name: Moonveil, the Lunar Edge
rare.description: Forged beneath the light of the full moon, this katana is as swift as moonlight itself.

rare.name: Windcutter, Blade of the Tempest
rare.description: With each swing, the katana slices through air and sound, leaving only silence.

common.name: Soulreaver, the Ghostly Strike
common.description: This katana can cleave through souls, leaving its victims lifeless husks.

common.name: Shimmerfang, the Ethereal Edge
common.description: A blade that flickers between dimensions, making it impossible to predict its movements.

legendary.name: Skyfall, Spear of the Heavens
legendary.description: A spear forged from the stars, it strikes with the force of a meteor descending from the sky.

legendary.name: Tempestpiercer, Lance of the Storm
legendary.description: The spearhead crackles with lightning, piercing the storm itself to strike its target.

rare.name: Sunglaive, Spear of the Radiant Dawn
rare.description: This spear channels the first rays of dawn, blinding its enemies with radiant light.

rare.name: Frostspire, Lance of the Northern Winds
rare.description: A spear that summons icy gusts with each thrust, freezing enemies solid.

common.name: Dusklance, Spear of the Fading Sun
common.description: This spear vanishes in twilight, reappearing only when its strike finds its mark.

common.name: Shadowfang, the Ghostly Pike
common.description: A spectral spear that phases through matter to strike the soul.

legendary.name: Nightsbane, Dagger of Eternal Silence
legendary.description: A dagger that consumes the sound around it, striking with absolute silence.

legendary.name: Voidfang, Edge of the Infinite Night
legendary.description: This dagger cuts through space itself, creating fissures in reality with each slash.

rare.name: Venomstrike, Blade of the Serpent
rare.description: A dagger tipped with deadly venom that poisons the very soul of its victims.

rare.name: Quickstrike, the Flashing Blade
rare.description: Faster than the eye can see, this dagger strikes with lightning speed.

common.name: Gloomshade, the Phantom Edge
common.description: This dagger fades in and out of visibility, making it difficult to detect or block.

common.name: Spellrend, the common Stiletto
common.description: A dagger that disrupts magic with a mere touch, unraveling spells and enchantments.

legendary.name: Starshot, Bow of the Celestial Hunt
legendary.description: A bow that shoots arrows forged from stardust, capable of striking targets across vast distances.

legendary.name: Tempeststring, Bow of the Raging Storm
legendary.description: This bow conjures arrows of lightning, striking down enemies with thunderous wrath.

rare.name: Dawnseeker, Bow of the First Light
rare.description: A bow that fires arrows infused with the light of dawn, piercing even the thickest darkness.

rare.name: Frostfeather, the Icy Flight
rare.description: This bow launches arrows that freeze the air as they fly, chilling enemies to the bone.

common.name: Gloomstring, Bow of the Shadowed Realm
common.description: A bow that draws its power from the shadows, striking from unseen angles.

common.name: Ethershot, Bow of the Hidden Planes
common.description: This bow fires arrows that pass through dimensions, striking targets from impossible distances.

legendary.name: Crown of Eternal Flames
legendary.description: A helmet wreathed in unending fire, granting immunity to fire-based attacks.

legendary.name: Helm of the Infinite Void
legendary.description: A helmet that warps perception, making the wearer difficult to target.

rare.name: Shadowveil Helm
rare.description: A helm that blends the wearer into shadows, making them harder to detect.

rare.name: Dawnlight Visor
rare.description: This helmet reflects the light of dawn, blinding enemies when struck by sunlight.

common.name: Ironforge Helm
common.description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides basic protection for any warrior.

common.name: Steelshade Protector
common.description: A simple steel helmet offering excellent defense against blunt force.

legendary.name: Aegis of the Eternal Guardian
legendary.description: A chestplate imbued with the essence of a guardian spirit, shielding the wearer from harm.

legendary.name: Infernal Carapace
legendary.description: Forged from demon scales, this armor radiates an intimidating aura of heat.

rare.name: Frostwarden Breastplate
rare.description: This armor emits a chilling aura, reducing the speed of enemies around the wearer.

rare.name: Stormforged Chestguard
rare.description: Crafted during a lightning storm, it resists electricity and grants enhanced agility.

common.name: Steelheart Chestplate
common.description: A durable chestplate that provides ample protection against physical attacks.

common.name: Ironhide Armor
common.description: A basic but effective chestplate made from reinforced iron.

legendary.name: Fists of the Thunderlord
legendary.description: Gauntlets crackling with lightning, enhancing the strength of the wearer.

legendary.name: Voidgrip Gauntlets
legendary.description: These gauntlets allow the wearer to manipulate objects from afar using void energy.

rare.name: Emberclasp Gloves
rare.description: Gauntlets that radiate intense heat, scorching anything they touch.

rare.name: Silverfang Grips
rare.description: Lightweight gauntlets that enhance dexterity and precision.

common.name: Bronzeplate Gauntlets
common.description: Sturdy gauntlets that provide reliable hand protection.

common.name: Ironclad Gloves
common.description: Simple yet effective, these gloves are perfect for basic combat.

legendary.name: Starlight Greaves
legendary.description: Greaves that make the wearer light as a feather, enhancing speed and agility.

legendary.name: Earthshatter Legguards
legendary.description: These greaves make each step feel like an earthquake, stunning nearby foes.

rare.name: Frostbound Greaves
rare.description: Leg armor that freezes the ground beneath the wearer, slowing pursuers.

rare.name: Sunlit Sabatons
rare.description: Greaves that glow with the light of the sun, enhancing endurance.

common.name: Ironstride Greaves
common.description: Reinforced greaves that provide excellent protection for the legs.

common.name: Steelstep Guards
common.description: Heavy greaves offering strong defense and stable footing.

legendary.name: Aegis of the Sun God
legendary.description: A shield that blinds enemies with radiant light when struck.

legendary.name: Voidbreaker Barrier
legendary.description: A shield that absorbs magic and reflects it back at attackers.

rare.name: Stormshield
rare.description: A shield that channels the power of storms, deflecting even the strongest blows.

rare.name: Frostguard Shield
rare.description: This shield emanates a chilling aura, slowing any foe that comes near.

common.name: Steelwall Defender
common.description: A large steel shield offering solid protection against physical attacks.

common.name: Ironbuckler Shield
common.description: A lightweight shield ideal for quick defense and mobility.

legendary.name: Shoulders of the Colossus
legendary.description: Pauldrons forged from the bones of ancient titans, enhancing the wearer's strength immeasurably.

legendary.name: Skybreaker, Mantle of the Stormlord
legendary.description: These pauldrons harness the power of thunderstorms, striking nearby enemies with lightning.

rare.name: Dawnshroud, Pauldrons of the Morning Star
rare.description: Glowing with the light of dawn, these pauldrons protect the wearer from dark magic.

rare.name: Ironwrath, the Unyielding Shoulders
rare.description: These heavily fortified pauldrons grant unmatched defense against all forms of physical assault.

common.name: Wraithguard, Spectral Pauldrons
common.description: Pauldrons that flicker with ghostly energy, granting the wearer the ability to walk among spirits.

common.name: Mysticbinders, Common Mantle
common.description: Pauldrons that store latent magic, empowering the wearer with bursts of common energy.
